product_overview: GradeFlow Enterprise Academy Management System is a comprehensive digital platform designed to manage school operations including admissions, student records, finance, and parent communications, enhancing administrative efficiency and student engagement.
core_goals: Provide a seamless online admission process for prospective students.
Manage student data including records, digital IDs, and data import/export efficiently.
Facilitate finance management with fee payment tracking and structure.
Offer a parent portal for accessing notifications, announcements, and submitting leave requests.
Automate communication through email notifications using an integrated email system.
key_features: Landing Home page offering a school overview and introduction.
Online Admissions module with application forms and administrative management interface.
Finance Management module featuring bursar station for payment handling and fee structure management.
Student Management system including student records, digital ID generation, and data import/export capabilities.
Parent Portal for notifications, announcements, leave request submissions, and related management.
Automated Email System leveraging Resend for sending notifications and communications efficiently.
user_flow_summary: Visitor lands on Home page to view school overview.
Prospective student fills out and submits an online admission application.
Admission administrators review and manage applications in Admissions Manager.
Bursar accesses Finance Manager to track fee payments and update fee structures.
Administrators manage student records and digital IDs within Student Manager.
Parents log into Parent Portal to view notifications, announcements, and submit leave requests.
Leave requests are processed via Leave Requests Manager by administrators.
System sends automated email notifications triggered by various events like admissions and leave requests.
validation_criteria: Successful submission and processing of online admission forms.
Accurate storage and retrieval of student records and digital IDs.
Correct tracking and recording of fee payments and structures.
Parents can access and use the Parent Portal effectively, including submission of leave requests.
Administrators can manage and process leave requests properly.
Email notifications are sent automatically and received as intended.
